content.rendered:
Enter your information below
to get best deals from Regatta








    Regatta Apartments Jakarta

    A nautical themed condominium Jakarta

    Cozy and bright. What about having a nice place to live that works as a sweet getaway? Owning a condominium Jakarta is a valuable piece of investment but if the home is also a place to leisure, then it´s a value added. Owning a Regatta apartment is like having a holiday home.

    The stunning skyscraper that owns the best condominium Jakarta!

    Regatta apartments are highly sought after due to its unique location. On the inside of this condominium Jakarta, the view is surprisingly calm and inviting – as if you were in a rural beach. However, it actually offers a modern living side by side with natural landscape as your daily views. A window that overlooks the Java sea – who can resist the beauty of Indonesia´s beautiful ocean that´s only a door step away? This is clearly the perks of living by the sea. An all day serenity!

    Regatta Jakarta and the modern tower facades

    Residing next to Pantai Mutiara, Pluit, the Regatta apartments Jakarta have 7 towers standing next to each other, namely Shanghai, New York, London, Dubai, Monte Carlo, Miami and Rio. Each lobby tower is inspired by the respective city and elegantly developed to meet the current lifestyle necessities.

    Each condominium Regatta Jakarta offers a different picturesque. The North tower has a sea view whilst the South tower offers an amazing cityscape. The eastern tower overlooks the pool whereas the west tower is facing the futuristic Dubai tower.

    Whether it is day or night, it is always amazing to view the sea and sunset from your living room window every day.

    Regatta apartments facilities

    Putting lifestyle as a priority, Regatta Jakarta ensures that you can unwind and feel a vacation atmosphere even when you´re home. Thus, essential facilities such as minimarket, laundry service, fitness and business center are available within reach. Spend your time doing all kinds of outdoor activities, using the jogging track, BBQ area or the exotic swimming pool under the skyline. Enjoy a relaxing retreat at Taman Sari Royal Heritage SPA just by going down from where you stay!

    Regatta apartment is close to Soekarno Hatta International Airport. This means you can cut down your travel time efficiently so you can make the most of your schedule. Additionally, for your retail therapy, the Baywalk Mall and Emporium Mall are in close distance. It´s a great destination alternatives when you´re not out exploring the city for vacations or when you just need a casual walk.

    Regatta apartments: The new Jakarta´s landmark

    Regatta condominium Jakarta has become a visible landmark. The incredible architectural concept of Regatta Jakarta earned international recognition as it won FIABCI (International Real Estate Federation) Prix d’Excellence Awards in 2010. Its Rio Tower is highly recommended condominium Jakarta in Indonesia by South East Asia Property Award 2011.

    The top of Regatta apartment towers is inspired by the yacht sail beautifully designed by Burj al Arab´s architect, Tom Wright. Due to its´ marvelous and unique shape, Regatta Jakarta is now a new iconic landmark in the city. Having Regatta Jakarta is a big investment. If you are interested to own an apartment at strategic location, contact us for a tour in Regatta apartments complex and experience an amazing living like no other.
